channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Erika Kirk says she forgives husband's assassin
item.description: In a stunning moment, the widow of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk said at his funeral that she forgives her husband's assassin.

item.title: The FCC Is a New Deal Relic
item.description: Put it on the ash heap of history so no one can misuse it.

item.description: New details emerged about Nicholas Roske — the would-be assassin of Justice Brett Kavanaugh — who now identifies as 'Sophie.'

item.title: Trump honors allies at dinner hosted by Ben Carson
item.description: President Trump announced Saturday that he will award Ben Carson the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation's highest civilian honor.
